reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at Palermo Suites and found the hotel very clean and large. We never made use of the very nice kitchen because with the complimentary breakfast and so many wonderful restaurants close by, why would you ever cook.
reviews.title: Very nice apartment/hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were all very helpful with recommendations for dinner and shows. The breakfast was very nice and the location very convenient to the subway.
reviews.title: Great Location with Great Staff!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I think that the although the location is convenient to Santa Fe and the subway, we might have liked being in Palermo Viejo a bit more. The location was a bit of a walk to nightspots, etc.
reviews.title: Terrific

reviews.text: Certainly a good value for the $$$.
reviews.title: Wonderful experience

reviews.text: I stayed here with my Boyfriend at the end of September and beginning of October 09.
reviews.title: Palermo Suites: Excellent

reviews.text: Palermo Suites is a charming boutique hotel in trendy Palermo. I travelled with 5 of my girlfriends and we had the best time! The staff is amazing, especially Gustavo. He and the team were gracious in telling us the best places to go. We enjoyed our experience so much that we threw the staff a party! Its a new hotel and is only minutes away from great shopping, museums and delicious restaurants. If you want to feel like you are in the middle of an Argentinian neighborhood, surrounded by places to go and see, I highly suggest Palermo Suites.
reviews.title: Loved Palermo Suites

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All the staff had excellent treatment.
reviews.title: Excellent
